name: Exotic Fishery
description:
You are tasked to catch some exotic fish, but the fish are from bullet hell!

The fish will try to defend themselves using bullets, which you must dodge with your hook. Some of them are really complicated, and it may take you different tries to finish the game.

You only have 3 fishing hooks, and if they all get destroyed, it's game over!

You can win the game by catching all 7 fish.

Good luck!

(minijam 104 submission, made with godot, palette used: oil6)
